name: Imagecompare
tagline: This project compares two images according to the image links that we provide and returns the comparison value in a scale from 0 to 100(0 for completely different and 100 for exactly similar).
body:
### imagecompare.
This project compares two jpeg images according to the image links that we provide and returns the comparison value in a scale from 0 to 100(0 for completely different and 100 for exactly similar).We also do not store the images offline.The project only compares images in the jpg format and the comparison is done pixelwise instead of histogram and other packages.The gd library in php is used for the working of the project.

### Dependencies
1.Apache Server 2.GD Library in Php

### Demo
The demo of the project can be viewed in http://svbox.phacsin.com

### The practical applications
1.to compare the signature in cheques with the signature stored during time of creation of account 2.authentication into online acounts with image comparison 3.home door security services

### Authors and Contributors
1. @surajsuraj 2. @harikrishnanr994  3.Sachin Giridhar 4.Jithin Babu 5.Alina Benny
